      • waitForAsyncJobs

        public static void waitForAsyncJobs()
                             throws ExecutionException,
                                    InterruptedException
        Waits for all asynchronous jobs to complete execution.
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - If an async job throws an exception
        InterruptedException - If the current thread is interrupted

      • asDelegate

        public static FunctionDelegate asDelegate(DelegateInfo delegate)
        Produces a wrapper interface that can be invoked to execute jobs on a job server.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate info containing the callsite information
        Returns:
        The job delegate interface

      • asDelegate

        public static <R> ProducerDelegate<R> asDelegate(ProducerDelegate<R> delegate)
        Produces a wrapper interface that represents a function that can be invoked on a job server to produce a result. This function does not accept any input.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The return type of the job
        Parameters:
        delegate - Represents a job that has no parameters and produces a result
        Returns:
        The job delegate interface

      • asDelegate

        public static <T> ConsumerDelegate<T> asDelegate(ConsumerDelegate<T> delegate)
        Produces a wrapper interface that represents a function that can be invoked on a job server to consume one input variable. This function does not produce a result.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the input
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job the consumes one input parameter
        Returns:
        the job delegate interface

      • asDelegate

        public static <T,R> FunctionDelegate<T,R> asDelegate(FunctionDelegate<T,R> delegate)
        Produces a wrapper interface that represents a function that can be invoked on a job server to produce a result. This function accepts one input parameter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the input parameter
        R - The type of the return value
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job that represents a function that accepts one input and produces a result
        Returns:
        the job delegate interface

      • asDelegate

        public static <T,U,R> BiFunctionDelegate<T,U,R> asDelegate(BiFunctionDelegate<T,U,R> delegate)
        Produces a wrapper interface that represents a function that can be invoked on a job server to produce a result. This function accepts two input parameters and produces a result.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the first input parameter
        U - The type of the second input parameter
        R - The type of the return value
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job that represents a function that accepts two inputs and produces a result
        Returns:
        the job delegate interface

        public static <T,U,V,R> TriFunctionDelegate<T,U,V,R> asDelegate(TriFunctionDelegate<T,U,V,R> delegate)
        Produces a wrapper interface that represents a function that can be invoked on a job server to produce a result. This function accepts three input parameters and produces a result.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the first parameter
        U - The type of the second parameter
        V - The type of the third parameter
        R - The type of the return value
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job the represents a function that accepts three inputs and produces a result
        Returns:
        the job delegate interface

      • delegate

        public static <T,U,V,R> R delegate(TriFunctionDelegate<T,U,V,R> delegate,
                                   T t,
                                   U u,
                                   V v)
        Synchronously executes the specified delegate function on a job server and produces a result. Exceptions thrown by the job are uncaught.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the first input parameter
        U - The type of the second input parameter
        V - The type of the third input parameter
        R - The return type of the job
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job the represents a function that accepts three inputs and produces a result
        t - The first parameter
        u - The second parameter
        v - The third parameter
        Returns:
        The result produced by the job function

                                T t)

      • delegate

        public static <R> R delegate(ProducerDelegate<R> delegate)

        R - The type of the return value
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job that represents a function that produces a value
        Returns:
        The result produced

      • delegate

        public static <R> void delegate(ProducerDelegate<R> delegate,
                                Callback<R> callback)
        Asynchronously executes the specified delegate function on a job server. The specified callback function is invoked upon completion of the job.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The type of the return value
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job that represents a function that produces a value
        callback - The function to be called after the job completes

      • delegate

        public static <T,R> void delegate(FunctionDelegate<T,R> delegate,
                                  T t,
                                  Callback<R> callback)
        Asynchronously executes the specified delegate function on a job server with the given input parameters. The specified callback function is invoked upon completion of the job.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the input parameter
        R - The type of the job's result value
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job that represents a function that accepts one input parameter and produces a result
        t - The input parameter
        callback - The function to be called after the job completes

      • delegate

        public static <T,U,R> void delegate(BiFunctionDelegate<T,U,R> delegate,
                                    T t,
                                    U u,
                                    Callback<R> callback)
        Asynchronously executes the specified delegate function on a job server with the given input parameters. The specified callback function is invoked upon completion of the job.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the first input parameter
        U - The type of the second input parameter
        R - The type of the job's result value
        Parameters:
        delegate - A job that represents a function that accepts two input parameters and produces a result
        t - The first input parameter
        u - The second input parameter
        callback - The function to be called after the job completes

                                      T t,
                                      U u,
                                      V v,
